author: 0xraino
content: <@427491045308235776> <@353136597522448385> , how comparable are the functionalities of this https://github.com/crate-crypto/rust-verkle to go-verkle? Is the former in a place where it should be built on and used for migration implementations or does there need to be a rewrite because some key assumptions have changed in the meantime?

author: gballet
content: They should be the same except for the proof part, rust-verkle doesn't use the Json format
